name: NUKE BIKE - Adventure Racing Game
description:
NUKE BIKE - Adventure Racing Game

One of the most extreme racing RPG indie games on Android. Every time you come up with the enemy in the new arena of post apocalipce world combining fun extrem races and enjoy the pumping player ! Take part in the race and have fun with millions of other players he took part in bike games online and in storyline mode on arenas of post-apocalyptic world in this bike racing game.

You will enjoy an exciting and eXtreme bike racing game with shooting and tricky stuns

take your Nuke Bike racing game and get all this:

FEATURES :

- Storyline mode action bike racing

- play multiplayer bike racing games tournaments for the game with real players!

- Stickman like ragdoll physics !

- Awersome graphics

- get prizes for online racing games (all or nothing bet system with crystals)

- Tricks with prizes depending on the pumping of luck!

- Powerful RPG (RPG) component, will allow not only to pump the bike, but also ulutsheno your hero as a notorious cage

- Playing the passage: your goal after going through the sorrow to find the net against pollution and the destruction of the last city

- The pleasure is guaranteed

- Easy and intuitive operation to play game

- Play free Wi-Fi, mobile networks of your operator

AMAZING OPORTUNITIES :

- Lots of crazy tracks and crazy worlds in online race - every time you come up with the enemy in the new arena!

- Cool stunts with prizes up to crystals

- Lots of amazing and powerful motor bikes with customizable parts

- Suits for motor bike rider

- Do not miss the free updates with lots of new content

CONTROLS:

- classic on screen buttons and easy menues

SOCIAL COMMUNITY :
